segments.text: Hello . Excuse me . Do you know if there's a Commercial Bank around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , go straight along Beijing Road and turn right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Straight on , and turn right . Is it far ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's just a couple of minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
